name: Release of Wish [1]
description: A wand made of crystal which gives out a reflecting shine can recover the ability of the master.
effect: INT ＋2,When casting a single target skill, there is a 10% chance to restore 5% HP and 5% SP

name: Release of Wish [2]
description: A magic staff made of crystal with fascinating brilliance. It has an ability to restore the owner's attributes.
effect: INT ＋2,When casting a single target skill, there is a 10% chance to restore 5% HP and 5% SP

name: Remains of Wind
description: The remains left by God’s battle only visited by wind now.

name: Renown Detective's Cap
description: It's said to be the favorite hat of the famous inspector Holmes. It fits well with the pipe.

description: It's said to be the favorite hat of the famous inspector Holmes. It fits well with the pipe.

description: It's said to be the favorite hat of the famous inspector Holmes. It fits well with the pipe.

name: Rescuer Shoes
description: These boots have been baptized by senior priests. Although they appear to be bulky, They are actually very light and hold blessings from the gods.
effect: Move Spd ＋5%,Effects of [HP Potion Cast] and [MP Potion Cast] ＋20%

name: Returning Chest
description: The pack can be opened after EP 2.0 Pet Lover is launched, to receive Lunatic Egg x1, Eclipsex1.

name: Returning Pack I
description: Dear adventures, welcome home! When you set off, Kafra prepared a Premium pack for you!

name: Returning Pack II
description: How do you like the game? You must have a good time with friends! We have a surprise for you!

name: Returning Pack III
description: Gift from Valkyrie, wish you become stronger in the adventure journey!

name: Returning Pack IV
description: Everybody has worn pretty headwear! You must not miss it! Have a look!

name: Returning Pack V
description: The world of love and adventure is more wonderful with you! Grow stronger with your friends!
